description:
There has always been a clear double standard in this country. Thats why black people find it funny when white people tell us “its not always about race” or “Why does everything have to be about race” 
YES, ITS ALWAYS ABOUT RACE BECAUSE IN A WHITE RUN SOCIETY YALL WILL NEVER LET US FORGET WE ARE DIFFERENT. “The media's the most powerful entity on earth. They have the power to make the innocent guilty and to make the guilty innocent, and that's power. Because they control the minds of the masses.”
Malcolm X

WITH SO MANY LIES BEING TOLD HOW DO WE KNOW WHAT TO BELIEVE?? #POPULATIONCONTROL 
#corona  #coronavirus  #COVID19 #Shutdown #Martiallaw #quarantine  #pandemic #5G #Vaccination
